feed.title: WatchState Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250131-3a2f0af
entry.content:
• 3a2f0af Merge pull request #593 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • d10a03c support backing up mutli-user data. by ArabCoders
  • 3e23a3b Filter data before saving it into events table by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250131-3a2f0af

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250131-612ec4f
entry.content:
• 612ec4f Merge pull request #592 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • b3e32fe filter env.SERVER.QUERY_STRING data as well by ArabCoders
  • 7c57c50 re-designed how we profile the http API to include bigger scope by ArabCoders
  • 44d3b32 Fixed performance regression in HTTP API by ArabCoders
  • 1d2a1da updated composer packages. by ArabCoders
  • b6aad34 dont use ProfilingFlags directly. by ArabCoders
  • 677ecc7 imporved the profiling process. by ArabCoders
  • 80f341e minor style changes by ArabCoders
  • 2987dea Show zip files in api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done. by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250131-612ec4f

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250201-92e1f20
entry.content:
• 92e1f20 Merge pull request #594 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • b4783a8 Standardize how we handle UserContext, added support for multi user in db:list command. by ArabCoders
  • dd84251 Redesigned redesigned how we create sub users config data by ArabCoders
  • 54a8556 fix the prev commit by ArabCoders
  • 87ac7e7 remove use backend id for X-Plex-Client-Identifier to not generate events for each version change by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593
  • Major sub users refactor by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/594

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250201-92e1f20

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250203-4982ef9
entry.content:
• 4982ef9 Merge pull request #597 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 821e611 minor improvements to logs display in index to use more human readable dates. by ArabCoders
  • 030fe8b fixed repo path by ArabCoders
  • 03fdef2 Add CHANGELOG to container. by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593
  • Major sub users refactor by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/594
  • Merged state:sync functionality into state:import and state:export by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/596
  • Minor frontend improvements by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/597

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250203-4982ef9

entry.title: New release for WatchState: master-20250203-95f4154
entry.content:
• 95f4154 Merge pull request #596 from arabcoders/dev by Abdulmohsen
  • 225ff0b Removed WS_PUSH_ENABLED as its always on now, and turn WS_SYNC_PROGRESS on by default. by ArabCoders
  • 2d5c63e Merged SyncCommand functionality into state:import and state:export And removed SyncCommand. by ArabCoders
  • a3fd28b followup fix for console by ArabCoders
  • b53a93d Fixed bug in trigger auto run for commands in console.vue by ArabCoders

What's Changed

  • Fix release title. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/577
  • re-enable dev builds by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/578
  • fix permissions by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/579
  • make build work on manual dispatch as well by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/580
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/581
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/582
  • Update auto release. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/583
  • Support per user mapper and database. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/584
  • Implement per user servers.yaml, and support mark as unplayed for all users by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/585
  • Free memory after each user sync, and prevent syncing main user by default as it's covered by the regular import/export, and provide flag to enable it. by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/586
  • Implements progress sync for all users via state:sync by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/587
  • Fully implemented our vision for Multi-user sync via state:sync command by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/588
  • Added new command to diff two backup files and find the difference by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/590
  • Compress backup files by default and extends lifetime of backups to 90d by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/591
  • Show zip files in backup api and remove the uncompressed file if compressing was done by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/592
  • support backing up mutli-user watch state via state:backup by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/593
  • Major sub users refactor by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/594
  • Merged state:sync functionality into state:import and state:export by @arabcoders in https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/pull/596

Full Changelog: https://github.com/arabcoders/watchstate/compare/master-20250118-a9fa743...master-20250203-95f4154
